00065 int C74_EXPORT main(void)
00066 {       
00067         t_class *c;
00068         
00069         c = class_new("bc.virfun", (method)bc_virfun_new, (method)bc_virfun_free, (long)sizeof(t_bc_virfun), 
00070                                   0L /* leave NULL!! */, A_GIMME, 0);
00071         // credits
00072         post("bc.virfun v0.1b – 2010: Virtual fundamental calculation");
00073         post("   design by Gérard Assayag with help from Bennett Smith");
00074         post("   external by Benjamin Lévy");
00075         
00076         // assistance
00077         class_addmethod(c, (method)bc_virfun_assist,"assist",A_CANT, 0); 
00078         
00079         // input methods
00080         //class_addmethod(c, (method)bc_virfun_bang, "bang", 0);
00081         class_addmethod(c, (method)bc_virfun_int, "int", A_LONG, 0);
00082         class_addmethod(c, (method)bc_virfun_float, "float", A_FLOAT, 0);
00083         class_addmethod(c, (method)bc_virfun_list, "list", A_GIMME, 0);
00084         //class_addmethod(c, (method)bc_virfun_anything, "anything",A_GIMME, 0);
00085         
00086         //class_addmethod(c, (method)bc_virfun_approx, "ft1", A_FLOAT, 0);
00087         
00088         // Mode attribute
00089         CLASS_ATTR_LONG(c, "mode", 0 , t_bc_virfun, a_mode);
00090         CLASS_ATTR_ENUMINDEX(c, "mode", 0, "Freq MIDI");
00091         CLASS_ATTR_SAVE(c, "mode", 0);
00092         
00093         // Approximation attribute
00094         CLASS_ATTR_FLOAT(c, "approx", 0, t_bc_virfun, a_approx);
00095         CLASS_ATTR_LABEL(c, "approx", 0, "Approximation (MIDI)");
00096         CLASS_ATTR_FILTER_MIN(c, "approx", 0.);
00097         CLASS_ATTR_SAVE(c, "approx", 0);
00098         CLASS_ATTR_ACCESSORS(c,"approx",NULL,bc_virfun_approx);
00099         
00100         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c); /* CLASS_NOBOX */
00101         bc_virfun_class = c;
00102         
00103         return 0;
00104 }

00111 void *bc_virfun_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00112 {
00113         t_bc_virfun *x = NULL;
00114         
00115         if (x = (t_bc_virfun *)object_alloc(bc_virfun_class))
00116         {
00117                 // outlets
00118                 x->out = intout(x);
00119         }
00120         if (argc)
00121         {
00122                 if ((argv)->a_type == A_LONG)
00123                         x->a_approx=(float)atom_getlong(argv);
00124                 else if ((argv)->a_type == A_FLOAT)
00125                         x->a_approx=atom_getfloat(argv);
00126                 else
00127                         x->a_approx = 0.5;
00128         }
00129         else
00130                 x->a_approx = 0.5;
00131         x->approxf=midi2freq_approx(x->a_approx);
00132         x->freqnb=0;
00133         x->freqs=NULL;
00134         
00135         // process attr args, if any
00136         attr_args_process(x, argc, argv);
00137         
00138         return (x);
00139 }

00144 {
00145         ;
00146 }

00151 void bc_virfun_assist(t_bc_virfun *x, void *b, long io, long index, char *s)
00152 {
00153         switch (io)
00154         {
00155                 case ASSIST_INLET: // inlets = 1
00156                         switch (index)
00157                 {
00158                         case 0: // leftmost
00159                                 sprintf(s, "Ordered list of frequencies (Hz)");
00160                                 break;
00161                         case 1:
00162                                 sprintf(s, "float: Approximation factor (MIDI)");
00163                                 break;
00164                 }
00165                         break;
00166                         
00167                 case ASSIST_OUTLET: // outlets = 2
00168                         switch (index)
00169                 {
00170                         case 0: // leftmost
00171                                 sprintf(s, "Virtual Fundamental"); 
00172                 }
00173                         break;
00174         }
00175 }

00184 void bc_virfun_list(t_bc_virfun *x, t_symbol *s, long ac, t_atom *av)
00185 {
00186         int i;
00187         float virfun;
00188         if (x->freqnb<ac)
00189         {
00190                 if (x->freqs)
00191                         free(x->freqs);
00192                 x->freqs=(float*)malloc(ac*sizeof(float));
00193                 x->freqnb=ac;
00194         }
00195         
00196         if (x->a_mode)
00197         {
00198                 for (i=0; i<ac; i++,av++)
00199                 {
00200                         if (atom_gettype(av)==A_LONG)
00201                                 x->freqs[i]=midi2freq((float)atom_getlong(av));
00202                         else if (atom_gettype(av)==A_FLOAT)
00203                                 x->freqs[i]=midi2freq(atom_getfloat(av));
00204                         else
00205                                 object_error((t_object*)x, "wrong argument type");
00206                 }
00207                 virfun = rec_virfun(x->freqs, x->freqs+ac, 0.1, x->freqs[0]*(1.0+x->approxf), x->approxf);
00208                 outlet_float(x->out, (round(freq2midi(virfun)/x->a_approx))*x->a_approx);
00209         }
00210         else
00211         {
00212                 for (i=0; i<ac; i++,av++)
00213                 {
00214                         if (atom_gettype(av)==A_LONG)
00215                                 x->freqs[i]=atom_getlong(av);
00216                         else if (atom_gettype(av)==A_FLOAT)
00217                                 x->freqs[i]=atom_getfloat(av);
00218                         else
00219                                 object_error((t_object*)x, "wrong argument type");
00220                 }
00221                 virfun = rec_virfun(x->freqs, x->freqs+ac, 0.1, x->freqs[0]*(1.0+x->approxf), x->approxf);
00222                 outlet_float(x->out, virfun);
00223         }
00224  }

00228 void bc_virfun_int(t_bc_virfun *x, long n)
00229 {
00230         t_max_err err;
00231         t_atom av;
00232         t_symbol *s_list = gensym("list");
00233         err = atom_setlong(&av, n);
00234         if (!err)
00235                 bc_virfun_list(x, s_list, 1, &av);
00237         
00238 }
00239 
00242 void bc_virfun_float(t_bc_virfun *x, double f)
00243 {
00244         t_max_err err;
00245         t_atom av;
00246         t_symbol *s_list = gensym("list");
00247         err = atom_setfloat(&av, f);
00248         if (!err)
00249                 bc_virfun_list(x, s_list, 1, &av);
00251 }

00256 
00259 t_max_err bc_virfun_approx(t_bc_virfun *x, void *attr , long ac, t_atom *av)
00260 {
00261         if (ac&&av) {
00262                 x->a_approx = atom_getfloat(av);
00263                 x->approxf=midi2freq_approx(x->a_approx);
00264         } else {
00265                 x->a_approx = 0.5;
00266         }
00267         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00268 }
00269 
00272 float rec_virfun(float* freqs, float* end, float divmin, float divmax, float approx)
00273 {
00274         float inf,sup;
00275         float quo_min, quo_max;
00276         float quotient;
00277         float resu = 0;
00278         if (divmin <= divmax)
00279         {
00280                 if (freqs==end)
00281                         return((divmin + divmax) / 2.);
00282                 else
00283                 {
00284                         sup = freqs[0] * (1 + approx);
00285                         inf = freqs[0] / (1 + approx);
00286                         quo_min = ceil(inf/divmax);
00287                         quo_max = floor(sup/divmin);
00288                         quotient = quo_min;
00289                         while (quotient <= quo_max)
00290                         {
00291                                 resu = rec_virfun(freqs+1,end, max(inf/quotient, divmin), min(sup/quotient, divmax), approx);
00292                                 if ((int)resu)
00293                                         return resu;
00294                                 quotient++;
00295                         }
00296                         return 0.;
00297                 }
00298         }
00299         return 0.;
00300 }
00301 
00304 float midi2freq_approx(float midi)
00305 {
00306         return pow(2,(midi/12.))-1.;
00307 }
00308 
00311 float freq2midi(float freqin)
00312 {
00313         return 69+12*log2(freqin/440.);
00314 }
00315 
00318 float midi2freq(float midin)
00319 {
00320         return 440.*pow(2, (midin-69.)/12.);
00321 }
